hitoAmmoutRequired: The amounts are required and can not be less than 0
almost2HitosRequired: At least 2 milestones are required to divide
hitoSplitted: Milestone has been splitted successfully. CRM has been updated successfully
opportunityRequired: The opportunity is not loaded in CRM. Update CRM before dividing the milestone
hitoQuantityBetween2and5: The number of milestones to be divided must be between 2 and 5
